titles.title: Give Me A Passion, A Passion For You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give me a passion, a passion for You. Give me a passion, a passion for You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not for Your Kingdom, Not for Your power, Not for a vision, You’ll bless for an hour. Not for service, And not for fame, Lord, I am after an unquenchable flame.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A flame that’s a passion, a passion for You. Blind me to all, but a passion for You.{/lang-eng}
